mapper.select: select a.mcid , a.mcid_name from map_data a left join vanish_map_data b on a.id = b.id where (b.vanish_yn is null or b.vanish_yn = 'n') and cast(px as double precision) between cast(#{minLng} as double precision) and cast(#{maxLng} as double precision) and cast(py as double precision) between cast(#{minLat} as double precision) and cast(#{maxLat} as double precision) group by mcid, mcid_name order by mcid_name desc
SELECT ADDR_1 FROM MAP_DATA WHERE ADDR_1 != '' GROUP BY ADDR_1 ORDER BY ADDR_1
SELECT ADDR_2 FROM MAP_DATA WHERE ADDR_2 != '' AND ADDR_1 = #{addr1} GROUP BY ADDR_2 ORDER BY ADDR_2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VANISH_MAP_DATA (id, request_cnt, init_dt, vanish_yn) VALUES ( #{id} , 1 , NOW() , 'n' )
